description: Try our easy to follow Antipasto Muffuletta Loaf recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Antipasto Muffuletta Loaf Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place loaf on a plate. Cut top quarter from loaf and reserve. Scoop bread out from centre of loaf, leaving a 2cm-thick shell. Spread dip inside shell and over cut side of top. Line base of loaf shell with salami. Top with capsicum, eggplant, mushroom, prosciutto, cheese, basil, mortadella and tomato. Replace top.

Wrap loaf tightly in plastic wrap. Place another plate on top and weigh down with a heavy object. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours or overnight to compress loaf and allow flavours to develop. Cut into wedges and serve.
